fields.title: The Shawshank Redemption
fields.review: Tough, complex story with clarity, compassion and considerable dramatic force. Beautiful screenplay and good-hearted story.

fields.title: The Godfather
fields.review: Beautifully crafted gangster film. A character study, amazing period piece and outstanding family portrait.

fields.title: All The President's Name
fields.review: Mesmerizing perfomance by both Dustin Hoffman and Robert Redford.

fields.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
fields.review: Best adaptation of a novel that Hollywood has ever produced.

fields.title: Rear Window
fields.review: One of the Hitchcock masterpiece. It has tension, suspense, humour and the story moves along at a good pace.

fields.title: Broker
fields.review: Slow-burn, heart-warming, new-found family story. Excellent performance from Song Kang Ho.

fields.title: Goodfellas
fields.review: One of the most iconic movies in the 90s. Priceless.

fields.title: Apocalypes Now
fields.review: A disturbing film, but a poignant character study and a brilliant depiction of the horrors of the Vietnam War.

fields.title: Chungking Express
fields.review: Chungking Express is a breezy little Hong Kong movie that has more life, energy, humanity and sheer visual zing than most other shows you'll see in a month or so.
